Congratulations to Greek Prime Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Greek Prime Minister 
    Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, sent a congratulatory message to Konstantinos Karamanlis upon his appointment as prime minister of Greece.
 Extending warm congratulations to him, the message wished him a great success in his responsible work for the stability and the development of the country and the well-being of the Greek people.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Foreign Minister of Greece
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Foreign Minister of Greece 
    Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun sent a congratulatory message to Petros Moliviatis upon his appointment as foreign minister of Greece.
 Expressing the belief that the relations between the two countries would improve and develop, the message wished him a great success in his work.

Pak Pong Ju Meets Co-heads of S. Korean Delegation
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Meets Co-heads of S. Korean Delegation 
    Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, met Senior Vice-chairman of the (south) Korean Confederation of Trade Unions Kang Sung Gyu and Chairman of the Emergency Measure Committee of the Federation of (south) Korean Trade Unions Pak Hon Su, who are co-heads of the delegation of the south Korean trade unions, and leading members of the delegation at the People's Palace of Culture Saturday.
 Present were Ryom Sun Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, and other officials concerned.    
 A conversation proceeded in a compatriotic atmosphere.

Message of Sympathy to Syrian President
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Syrian President
    Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, sent a message of sympathy to Bashar Al Assad, president of the Syrian Arab Republic, on April 30 in connection with recent terrorism in Damascus.
 Bitterly denouncing this terrorist attack as a dastardly act of the disruptive forces to undermine security and stability in Syria, the message said: Availing myself of this opportunity, I express firm support and solidarity with the friendly government and people of Syria in their struggle to smash all moves of the hostile forces, defend the security and stability of the country and consolidate the national unity under your leadership.

Indonesian FM Arrives
articles.content:
Indonesian FM Arrives
    Pyongyang, May 1 (KCNA) -- Nur Hassan Wirayuda, Indonesian foreign minister, and his party arrived here today.
 They were greeted by Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, officials concerned and staff members of the Indonesian embassy to the DPRK.
